title: Maps' Top

replies.body:
Considering how a lot of people viewed the maps, this isn't too much of a surprise. I personally would order it like this, though 

  1. Senex 
  2. Halcyon
  3. Senex 2
  4. Mute City 2
  5. Castle Adventure
  6. Clay wars
  7. Palm Rust
  8. Port Town 2
  9. Formorgar 2
  10. Dust Devils
  11. Infernus
  12. Justice 2
  13. Campi Erbosi 2

replies.body:
Top 3

1. Halcyon - great and fun to play, also great to kf on.
2. Senex I - Really enjoyable when it takes long time, you get lots of kills if you kf and it has such great gameplay!
3. Infernus - amazing to kf on, nice gameplay.

replies.body:
Senex is the worst fucking piece of shit ever, the map itself is too narrow and too long.
and to be perfectly honest the best map there is Dust Devils so yeah.

Maps that should be back -

Fissura
Quintus
Formorgar I

Removed -

Senex I and II
Castle Adventure

Just my opinions.

replies.body: I think people misunderstood the purpose of this thread. From what I saw, this wasn't supposed to be a place for people to list their personal map orders; it was meant to be a place to organize maps based on their current ingame ratings.
replies.body_tagged: I think people misunderstood the purpose of this thread. From what I saw, this wasn't supposed to be a place for people to list their personal map orders; it was meant to be a place to organize maps based on their current ingame ratings.

replies.body:
Just to compile the ratings properly, here is how the maps on the Destroy and Mix servers stand (as of this post):

Destroy

4.17 - Halcyon I
4.04 - Senex I
3.93 - Senex II
3.63 - Castle Adventure
3.57 - Clay Wars
3.53 - Palm Rust
3.50 - Justice 2
3.46 - Dust Devils
3.39 - Port Town 2
3.37 - Mute City 2
3.36 - Formogar II
3.15 - Campi Erbosi 2
3.11 - Infernus

Mix

4.29 - Rendezvous
4.17 - Halcyon I (map is also on Destroy)
3.57 - Clay Wars (map is also on Destroy)
3.57 - Mute City 3
3.53 - Wool Terrace
3.38 - Sweet Slopes
3.38 - The Badlands
3.32 - Luar Remastered
3.26 - Terra CTF

Some points I would like everybody to keep in mind:
  • These ratings are still very new. There are currently not enough ratings to make decisions from these averages.
  • Even once there are more ratings, the map developers will not decide rotations solely based on the ratings. Ratings are only indicative of the community's opinion on a map, and the community's opinion, while certainly useful, is usually not going to be the main deciding factor in deciding rotations. Factors such as gameplay and aesthetics will still be taken into consideration.
